banner.toptitle: Do you have a vison ? Let's make it happen !
banner.text: Hotcodes is a web development company that provides cutting edge technology to make your business grow. We have a team of talented developers, designers and digital marketers who will help you to become better with our extraordinary services.

services.title: Our Unique & Awesome Core Services
services.text: Hotcodes provides the best services that might suit your needs. Our team works continuously to ensure that you are satisfied with our services. Hotcodes is the leading platform for the tech industry, and we aim to provide the best products and services for our clients.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing
marketing.text: HotCodesâ€™ Digital Marketing Services will get your business found in searches, drive leads and sales, and keep you ahead of the competition

quality.title: High-quality Design
quality.text: You can't go wrong with HotCodes. We make high quality design for your business. Don't take our word for it--just check out our amazing portfolio of templates.

webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.text: Responsive Web design is key. Here at HotCodes, we ensure that every project is done right and meet the standards in the front-end world.

optimization.title: Speed Optimization
optimization.text: We optimizes fast websites and speeds them up. We provide hyper-optimized pages that load faster than the original HTML. We use nextjs and Nuxt, which deliver fast, performant, stable websites with hotloading or loads of content user-defined options now available for you to use!

custom.title: Fully Customizable Apps
custom.text: We create fully customizable apps that look and feel great, are easy to use, and help your customers get what they need.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.text: Hotcodes is a full-service web design and development company that works with small businesses, entrepreneurs, and professionals to help build their sites. We maintain your existing website, provide ongoing training on current website best practices, and update your site regularly.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Know all details about our company
about.text: We aim to build a fast growing companies by embracing the trends in the market and delivering high quality services in a highly competitive market.

text.title: Hotcodes is a group of developers, designers and marketers
text.body: with the aim of conquering the largest international markets. We are passionate about the subject of technology and our goal is to create fast growing companies.

text.title: Hotcodes is a service company and also a cradle of IT startups.
text.body: We believe that the barriers that have prevented smaller investors from entering into the capital markets are quickly becoming obsolete. We envision a world where one can easily invest in unicorn companies, or participate in the initial public offerings of large corporations, with little to no personalized or financial risk.

text.title: We are a team of young men who share the same vision:
text.body: We are a young, ambitious and dynamic team of men who got together to fulfil our respective dreams and visions. We share the same vision of revolutionizing Africa's market value and to create wealth for Africans by building an economically strong and prosperous Africa.

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.subtitle: Meet With Our Creative Dedicated Team
team.text: We are a professional team of developers that are looking to build new and exciting applications. Our goal is to create an application that solves your problem, be it a website or an app. Our team will be able to provide you with all the resources you need to get started on your project so that your vision can be realized.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore Our Latest Case Studies
portfolio.text: You can start building your new work portfolio with any of the projects or designs we have in our portfolio.

pricing.title: Pricing plans
pricing.subtitle: Affordable pricing with simple plans
pricing.text: hotcodes offer affordable pricing plans to fit your budget. In addition, we have a variety of payment options such as payment plans, monthly payments and other on-going payment options.
pricing.propositiontext: Contact our team to get a quote.

pricingplan.pricetext: Very affordable pricing that will not find nowhere else.

contactus.title: support
contactus.subtitle: Need any help say hello
contactus.text: Feel free to contact us for any help you need. We provide 24/7 customer support for our customers

cta.title: Looking for a collaboration ? Get Started today!
cta.text: We're working hard on innovating the way we do business. Join our collaborative community and be a part of the future of technology.
